name: Mission Demolition (RiftStudier)
description:
Title: Mission Demolition

Platform: Web Browser 

Game Genre: Puzzle (Physics) 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Mission Demolition is a physics based puzzle game about knocking down castles. Launch a projectile out of the slingshot to hit the goal buried in each structure's center.

Instructions: Left-click and hold near the slingshot to load the projectile, move the mouse while holding to change the aim, and release the mouse to launch the projectile. Try to hit the green goal in each fort in as few shots as possible.

 Game Design Team: Aidan Pohl – Game Designer
